body:
- Implemented validation for Ipv4 ([`0cb53888`](https://github.com/wellingtoncosta/convalida/commit/0cb538883cf6633666f9d8e6e586f082a9a80b1f))
- Implemented validation for Ipv6 ([`4db65b08`](https://github.com/wellingtoncosta/convalida/commit/4db65b085f2a6437a16e74f3c370f47bbfef8387))
- Implemented validation for Url ([`d63616e6`](https://github.com/wellingtoncosta/convalida/commit/d63616e6571b03e1e509a0cc91d44b42a7fbeab8))
- Implemented validation for past date limit ([`4194e430d`](https://github.com/wellingtoncosta/convalida/commit/4194e430d3cb849a65bea3e3145883283e2ddff0))
- Implemented validation for future date limit ([`e882b2bd`](https://github.com/wellingtoncosta/convalida/commit/e882b2bd45cf2fa0ad5db3033166cc620c8dacdc))
- Redesign of Convalida Kotlin DSL ([`6b2a3e6c`](https://github.com/wellingtoncosta/convalida/commit/6b2a3e6c47369e2c85dda0702656894c66bc9b86))
- Code design improvements on `ConvalidaCompiler` ([`d0502c60`](https://github.com/wellingtoncosta/convalida/commit/d0502c6014242e712cc91f7d8ff4b8b0f90fa49f))
- Prevent unnecessary code generation ([`a07ece77`](https://github.com/wellingtoncosta/convalida/commit/a07ece77f2a0b14d24098b07c572088bc5774145))
- Improvement on core logic of validators classes ([`97ca5c5d`](https://github.com/wellingtoncosta/convalida/commit/97ca5c5ddcffcd2045f0c18bef4d128c1e9b7520))
- Improvement on instrumented tests ([`94d48b70`](https://github.com/wellingtoncosta/convalida/commit/94d48b70c84a5e16f4c229134b4d9fa16dccb7d8))
- Packages organization ([`a43f30bc`](https://github.com/wellingtoncosta/convalida/commit/a43f30bce91208722e42140b83a14c51133b56c4))
Validations for ISBN #45 and CNPJ #47 ([`5b49be`](https://github.com/WellingtonCosta/convalida/commit/5b49be576d5aa8cc6c4e72e7915615890bd9fb9f))

- Added support to apply validations using a Kotlin Dsl ( #38 )
- Added way to get invalid fields in `OnValidationError` method ( #39 )
- Added parameter to receive `errorMessage` as pure String value to all validations ( #43 )
- Artifacts are now deployed in Maven Central (#40 )
- Removed `Validation` suffix from all annotations and bindings ( #42 )
- Migrated project to support AndroidX ( #37 )

name: 3.0.0-beta01
body:
- Move artifacts from Jitpack to Maven Central
- Get invalid fields in OnValidationError method  ([`58eed4d1`](https://github.com/WellingtonCosta/convalida/commit/58eed4d1eaf87c1068da7b08b9a04810b86697d1))
- Add parameter to receive error message as pure string value in all validations ([`40c5eb21`](https://github.com/WellingtonCosta/convalida/commit/40c5eb21689846f5d0ebc0f08c890fcb7337f2f4))
- Remove "Validation" suffix from all annotations and bindings ([`122cd770`](https://github.com/WellingtonCosta/convalida/commit/122cd770794f59384459f2608d4821e92a76c909))
- Support AndroidX packages ([`07c0d430`](https://github.com/WellingtonCosta/convalida/commit/07c0d430cf19c9705b6af7824251520ad80c80a4))

- Validation for credit card fields
- Validation for numeric limit (min / max) fields
- Added ```required``` property in ```EmailValidator```, ```LengthValidator```, ```OnlyNumberValidator```, ```PatternValidator```, ```CpfValidator```, ```CreditCardValidator``` and ```NumberLimitValidator``` that, when its value is ```true```, the field validation will be ignored if the field value is empty

- Support validation between fields
- Improvement in unit tests
- Ignored special characters in cpf validation
- Support for CPF (Brazilian personal registration number) validation

- Updated dependencies
- Fixed bug where compiler was not processing ```@ValidateOnClick```, ```ClearValidationsOnClick```, ```OnValidationSuccess``` and ```OnValidationError``` annotations
- Fixed JaCoCo build error with Android 27

- ```@NotEmptyValidation``` renamed to ```@RequiredValidation```
- Code refactoring
- Data binding support

- Java 8 code rewritten to Java 7 code
- Bug fixes

- Bug fixes

Thansk @emanuelet for the help!

- Kotlin code rewritten to Java code
- Fixed build error between Travis CI and Android 27
- Bump dependencies
- Ignore validation if view is not visible
- Build error fix
- Add ```autoDismiss``` parameter in all annotations

- Refactoring
- Using only ```EditText``` fields to apply the validations
- Build error fix
- Confirm email validation

- Optimized generated code
- Removed ```Convalida.init(this)```

- Refactoring
- Execute and clear the validations by annotations
- Added the sources.jar

- Unit tests
- UI tests
- Code coverage
- Bug fixes
- Bug fix

- Refactoring
- Bug fixes

- Refactoring
- Changed way to get Android string resources

- Travis CI integration
- Bug fixes
Bug fix
First release
